Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization problem with a linear objective function and linear constraints. Variables are continuous.

Name: Integer Programming
Solvability: but variables must take integer values.

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Combines LP and IP: some variables are continuous

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Objective function or constraints are nonlinear. Variables are continuous.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Subclass of NLP where objective is convex (minimization) and feasible set is convex. Guarantees global optima.

Name: Binary Programming
Description: Special case of IP where variables are restricted to 0 or 1.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Method for optimizing over time using recursive decomposition.
Example: Shortest path in a staged network

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Objective or constraints involve random variables; optimizes expected outcomes.
